item.description: setup.py and rpm.spec So recently at work I needed to package a tool we wrote at work. The tool was written in Python (big surprise) and it was designed to be run as a daemon so it had an init-script. Python tools are generally packaged by writing a setup.py script. There are actually a number of tools you can use (I’ve used distutils and setuptools in the past) and there’s a bit of a confusing history regarding which tool is recommended.
